Title: I Will Die Without You
Actors: Giorgi Zanguri, Irakli Sanaia, Ia Sukhitashvili, Shorena Begashvili
Plot: A film with parallel editing tells about two youngsters from Tbilisi. The action takes place on one frosty day in winter. Zaza is a writer, Mamula is a criminal. They do not know each other...
